sentences.en: a storyteller who can hold audiences spellbound
sentences.cn: 讲故事能让听众如痴如醉的人

sentences.en: And Hollywood is less ashamed of its role as global storyteller than it used to be.
sentences.cn: 而好莱坞对其扮演的全球说书人一角,不像过去那么羞愧了.

sentences.en: Donald Trump, that well - known storyteller , was whistling merrily yesterday.
sentences.cn: 吹牛大王特鲁普昨天又在自鸣得意.

sentences.en: Hans Andersen is regarded not just as a good storyteller, but as a great writer.
sentences.cn: 人们不仅仅反安徒生看成是故事大王, 而把他看成伟大的作家.

sentences.en: He was our greatest storyteller, without question.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，他是我们最会讲故事的人。

sentences.en: He was the one who first set down the stories of the Celtic storytellers.
sentences.cn: 他是第一个将凯尔特说书人讲的故事记载下来的人。

sentences.en: Ona journey to the storyteller's mind.
sentences.cn: 就在那讲故事的人的脑海中.

sentences.en: Our teacher, who is a Chinese American an excellent storyteller.
sentences.cn: 我们的老师是位美籍华人, 她擅长于讲故事.

sentences.en: Rukmeni's a great storyteller, so she'll probably spin them a yarn about some prince or god.
sentences.cn: 鲁克马尼非常善于讲故事，她有可能给他们编个什么王子或神的故事。

sentences.en: She was a storyteller beyond compare.
sentences.cn: 她是个无与伦比的讲故事高手。

sentences.en: Suddenly the murmuring stopped and all eyes turned to their favorite and most skillful storyteller.
sentences.cn: 突然,窃窃私语的声音停止了,屋里所有人的目光都转向了他们最喜欢和最擅长讲故事的人.

sentences.en: The children listened enthralled as the storyteller unfolded her tale.
sentences.cn: 讲故事的人一步步展开故事情节,孩子们都听得入迷了.

sentences.en: The children were amused by the storyteller's jokes.
sentences.cn: 孩子们听了讲故事的人的笑话都觉得好笑.

sentences.en: The mind of the storyteller has great imaginative powers.
sentences.cn: 讲故事人的头脑极富想像力.

sentences.en: They all listened to the storyteller with thirsty ears.
sentences.cn: 他们津津有味地听说书人讲故事.

sentences.en: Who were these Magi? Why did the storyteller give them this name?
sentences.cn: 谁是这些占星家? 为什么讲故事的人会给他们这个名字?
